long_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch has triathlon-ready features to take you from workouts to race day. 100-hr. chronograph with lap or split option, 30-lap memory recall and 24-hr. countdown timer with stop and repeat capabilities help log your progress. 3 time zones and daily, weekday and weekend alarms with 5 min. backup make training session reminders a snap. 99-lap counter and built-in setting reminders let you focus on hitting your zone without losing track during training sessions. Indiglo(R) All Day display and night light makes reading time and data quick and easy. Oversize digits are easy to read at a glance, even while you're running. The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch has triathlon-ready features to take you from workouts to race day.
